channel.title: HKG:1668 on 无关紧要的宇宙
channel.description: Recent content in HKG:1668 on 无关紧要的宇宙

item.title: Builder China South City Ordered to Liquidate by Hong Kong Court
item.description: Developer China South City Holdings Ltd. was ordered to liquidate by Hong Kong’s High Court, making it the biggest Chinese builder by assets to be wound up since China Evergrande Group.
